attributes.action: ban the use of non energy eficiant light bulbs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Austrailia has announced it is to ban the sale of non energy eficiant light bulbs as of 2010
As a low energy lightbulb user I can confirm that I alone saved over £10 per month in a 3 bedroom house by switching.
The cost of energy saving bulbs can be as little as £1 and all old age, disabled and thoughs on beifits qualify for free bulbs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
